availability.title: 🕒 Availability
availability.description: I'm particularly interested in environments that value code quality, testing, and clear communication.

title: 📬 Let's Get in Touch
text: If you'd like to discuss a full-stack, QA / testing, or hybrid role — or simply talk about projects, quality, or learning — feel free to reach out.
slogan: 🚀 Good software starts with good communication. Let's build — and test — something meaningful together.
